channel.title: PSP - Custom Firmware?
channel.description:
I have been looking on youtube about PSP custom firmware and what you can do with it and such.
Seems complicated, and there are different ways of doing it, and if i try and do it, i don't know what i would need. The most popular way is using a pandora battery i think, and you can make you're own...
Has anyone got CFW on there PSP ? And how did you do it, and what does downgrading you're psp do ect...

item.title: PSP - Custom Firmware?
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

I used a TIFF exploit but if you’ve been updating your psp it won’t work so pandora’s your best bet.

Read full topic

item.title: PSP - Custom Firmware?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Because 1.5 is basically the most “modifiable” FW that the psp had. You have to get to that FW in order to upgrade to a custom one.

Read full topic

item.title: PSP - Custom Firmware?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

^ I saw a video of how to downgrade to 1.5, but why ? Would you then just download CFW then put it on you’re PSP ?

Read full topic

item.title: PSP - Custom Firmware?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

I do, downgrading is well downgrading your firmware to a previous version.

Read full topic
